snippet: The future of the Saints and the Pelicans is at stake as their owner, Tom Benson, and his wife of 10 years battle his children, who sued to declare him mentally unfit.
abstract: Controversy surrounds New Orleans Saints and New Orleans Pelicans as owner Tom Benson is sued by daughter Renee and her two children over his decision to bequeath teams to his wife Gayle rather than to them; suit seeks to have Benson declared mentally unfit and to put Renee in charge of his property and person.
lead_paragraph: The future of the Saints and the Pelicans is at stake as their owner, Tom Benson, and his wife of 10 years battle his children, who sued to declare him mentally unfit.

headline.seo: Tom Benson and His Family Are Locked in Inheritance Dispute Over Saints and Pelicans
headline.main: Saints’ Owner Marches Out of Step With His Heirs’ Expectations
headline.print_headline: Saints’ Owner Marches Out of Step With His Heirs’ Expectations
